abstract: A two-hour edition of “So You Think You Can Dance” attracted an average of 8.4 million viewers on Wednesday from 8 to 10 p.m., making Fox No. 1 in the ratings for the night, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: A two-hour edition of “So You Think You Can Dance” attracted an average of 8.4 million viewers on Wednesday from 8 to 10 p.m., making Fox No. 1 in the ratings for the night, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
